name: Famicom Detective Club: The Girl Who Stands Behind
overview: Discover a piece of Nintendo history Originally released for the Family Computer Disk System in Japan, the Famicom Detective Club series is finally available with English text for the first time. The graphics, music, and sound effects of the original game have been faithfully upgraded for the Nintendo Switch™ system. You can also choose the original 8-bit soundtrack. Plus, enjoy all-new voice acting in Japanese.
